name: Word search puzzle (itch)
description:
Word Search is a classic crossword puzzle game for Android !
Get ready for free word search word games . Boost your vocabulary and have fun doing it with this addictive search game.
The game is easy to play, slide the letters up, down, left, right, diagonally in any of eight directions. Search and find all the words hidden in the grid. Increase your vocabulary and have fun!
Enjoy classic word search games, now for free and for the whole family, very easy to play.
Find words within the Word search and pass the levels to advance in difficulty. The game shows the word to search for, and they disappear once you have found them .
